nodes.text: The Vigilant was a CR90 corvette that was part of the Rebel Alliance's fleet. The Vigilant was sent by Base One to assist Extraction Team Bravo on their extraction of Jyn Erso from the Imperial Detention Center & Labor Camp LEG-817. The Vigilant was then quickly destroyed when an Imperial I-class Star Destroyer arrived in the Wobani system.
The Vigilant was an CR90 corvette manufactured by the Corellian Engineering Corporation. Like all CR90 corvettes, the Vigilant was armed with 2 dual turbolasers and 4 single turbolasers.
The Vigilant appears in the VR mission for Star Wars Battlefront, released in December 2016.
